sentences.en: A grasp of mundane affairs is genuine knowledge; an understanding of worldly wisdom is true learning.
sentences.cn: 世事洞明皆学问, 人情练达即文章.

sentences.en: Are spiritual or worldly values more important?
sentences.cn: 精神上的价值重要,还是物质的价值重要 呢 ?

sentences.en: He bequeathed her all his worldly goods.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的财物遗赠给她.

sentences.en: He carried all his worldly possessions in an old hold - all.
sentences.cn: 他将所有的个人财物放在一只旧手提箱里.

sentences.en: He is fond of worldly enjoyments.
He seemed very calm and far removed from worldly concerns.
sentences.cn: 他显得非常淡定，完全没有俗世的忧虑。

sentences.en: Her rather tough and worldly exterior hides a very soft and sensitive heart.
sentences.cn: 她那强硬而世故的外表下掩藏着一颗温柔而敏感的心。

sentences.en: I think it is time you woke up and focused your thoughts on more worldly matters.
sentences.cn: 我认为是该你清醒过来把思想集中到更为现实的问题上的时候了。

sentences.en: In the eye of the Buddhist, every worldly affair is vain.
sentences.cn: 在佛教徒的眼里, 人世上一切事情都是空的.

sentences.en: She forsook her worldly possessions to devote herself to the church.
sentences.cn: 她抛弃世上的财物而献身教会.

sentences.en: The group forswears all worldly possessions.
sentences.cn: 这个团体放弃一切尘世财物。

sentences.en: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

sentences.en: To Mr. Lorry, he commended them all, and explained his worldly affairs.
sentences.cn: 他向罗瑞先生托付了全家, 安排了他的世俗事务.

sentences.en: Today the media drive athletes to the view that the important thing is to gain worldly success.
sentences.cn: 现在，媒体使得运动员认为追名逐利是很重要的。

sentences.en: Worldly success could prove a snare unless used for the good of others.
sentences.cn: 若不用于为他人谋福祉，俗世的成功到头来不过是个枷锁而已。

words.tran_cn: 世界；领域；宇宙；世俗；全人类；物质生活

trans.tran_cn: 世间的，世上的，尘世的，追逐名利的，鄙俗的
trans.tran_en: relating to ordinary life rather than  spiritual  or religious ideas
